General.Name: Jiangxi Chen Guang New Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Chenguang New Materials Company Limited, a special chemical company, develops, produces, and sells functional silane basic raw materials, intermediates, and downstream products in China and internationally. Its products include hydrogen-containing, chloropropyl, alkylsilane, amino-containing, vinyl, sulfur-containing, epoxy-containing, and methacryloxy silane products; orthosilicates; water-based waterproofing agents; and other silane polymers. Its products are used in various applications, such as adhesives and sealants; rubber processing; waterproof and surface protection; paints, inks, and coatings; plastics, fiberglass, and composite materials; and mineral filler treatment. Jiangxi Chenguang New Materials Company Limited was founded in 2001 and is based in Jiujiang, China.
